after_or_equal: {{value}} must be a date after or equal to {{date}}.
alpha: The field can only contain letters.
alpha_dash: The field can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
alpha_num: The field can only contain letters and numbers.
before_or_equal: Enter a date before or equal to {{date}}.

between.numeric: This field must be a value between {{min}} and {{max}}.
between.file: The file must weigh between {{min}} and {{max}} MB.
between.string: This field must contain between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
between.array: This field must contain between {{min}} and {{max}} items.

boolean: This field must be true or false.
date: {{value}} does not correspond to a valid date.
date_equals: {{value}} must be a date equal to {{date}}.
date_format: {{value}} does not match the date format {{format}}.
ends_with: {{value}} must end with one of the following values: {{values}}

gt.numeric: This field must be greater than {{value}}.
gt.file: This field must weigh more than {{value}} kilobytes.
gt.string: This field must contain more than {{value}} characters.
gt.array: This field must contain more than {{value}} items.

gte.numeric: This field must be greater than or equal to {{value}}.
gte.file: This field must weigh {{value}} or more kilobytes.
gte.string: This field must contain {{value}} or more characters.
gte.array: This field must contain {{value}} or more items.

lt.numeric: This field must be less than {{value}}.
lt.file: This field must weigh less than {{value}} kilobytes.
lt.string: This field must contain less than {{value}} characters.
lt.array: This field must contain less than {{value}} items.

lte.numeric: This field must be less than or equal to {{value}}.
lte.file: This field must weigh {{value}} or less kilobytes.
lte.string: This field must contain {{value}} or less characters.
lte.array: This field must contain {{value}} or less items.

max.numeric: This field must not be greater than {{max}}.
max.file: This field must not weigh more than {{max}} kilobytes.
max.string: This field must not contain more than {{max}} characters.
max.array: This field must not contain more than {{max}} items.

mimes: This field must be a file of type: {{values}}.
mimetypes: This field must be a file of type: {{values}}.

min.numeric: This field must be at least {{min}}.
min.file: This field must weigh at least {{min}} kilobytes.
min.string: This field must contain at least {{min}} characters.
min.array: This field must contain at least {{min}} items.

required_if: This field is required when the {{other}} field is {{value}}.
required_unless: This field is required unless {{other}} is in {{values}}.
required_with: This field is required when {{values}} is present.
required_with_all: This field is required when {{values}} are present.
required_without: This field is required when {{values}} is not present.
required_without_all: This field is required when none of the {{values}} fields are present.
starts_with: {{value}} must start with one of the following values: {{values}}.
